## Block.appendEndRowInput() method

Appends an input that ends the row.

**Signature:**

```typescript
appendEndRowInput(name?: string): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | _(Optional)_ Optional language-neutral identifier which may used to find this input again. Should be unique to this block. |

**Returns:**

[Input](./blockly.input.md)

The input object created.
